summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Licensing and Regulation of certain amusements and amusement places; amending Sections 22, 23 and 24 of the License Code (Ordinance 48022) and repealing Sections 23.1, 23.A, 23-B, 23-C, 23-C-1, 23-D, 23-E, 23-F, 25, 26, 26-A, 27, 27-A, 27-B, 27-C, 49 and 51 of said License Code.
